id: Create Photorealistic Images in Midjourney Cheat Sheet.
name: Create Photorealistic Images in Midjourney Cheat Sheet.
description: All the infor you need to create photorealistic images in Midjourney. Cheat Sheet + Notion Doc with Photographic Elements.(9) Midjourney Prompt Formulas(14) Key Photographic Elements(22) Camera Selections(11) Lens Selection(16) Film Stocks(12) Photography Styles(27) Lighting Conditions(6) Depth of Field(10) Perspectives(18) Compositions(8) Motions(9) Textures(10) Color Grades(12) Photography Perspectives TLDR: Make Mijourney images look real.
features: (9) Midjourney Prompt Formulas; (14) Key Photographic Elements; (22) Camera Selections; (11) Lens Selection; (16) Film Stocks; (12) Photography Styles; (27) Lighting Conditions; (6) Depth of Field; (10) Perspectives; (18) Compositions
